actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for an increase in the aid and attendance allowance for severely disabled veterans with non-service-connected disabilities.

summary.text: Increases flat rates for certain unmarried veterans' aid and attendance allowance from $5,680 to $7,150. Increases flat rates for certain married veterans' aid and attendance allowance from $6,781 to $8,251.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for an increase in the aid and attendance allowance for severely disabled veterans with non-service-connected disabilities.
